Isabella Rodriguez.description: closing up the cafe and getting ready for her friends' night out @ the Ville:Isabella Rodriguez's apartment:main room:refrigerator

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller are coordinating with Isabella for the friends night out planning session at Hobbs Cafe, making sure they have all necessary materials and a shopping list ready. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus, how was your dinner meeting with the park staff?
Klaus Mueller
It went well, thanks for asking. How are you doing? Are you still busy with work?
Maria Lopez
I'm doing well, just finishing up some inventory checks at the store. We are meeting at Hobbs Cafe at 7pm to plan tomorrow's friends night out, remember?
Klaus Mueller
Yes, I remember. Let's finish up here and head to Hobbs Cafe to finalize the plans.
Maria Lopez
Shall we go over to Hobbs Cafe now to start planning?
Klaus Mueller
Great idea, Maria. Let's head over to Hobbs Cafe now and start planning.
Maria Lopez
Shall we bring Isabella in on the planning as well?
Klaus Mueller
Yes, let's include Isabella in the planning. She has great ideas and it's important to make sure she feels included.
Maria Lopez
Shall we text Isabella to let her know to meet us at Hobbs Cafe for the planning?
Klaus Mueller
Yes, let's text Isabella to let her know to meet us at Hobbs Cafe for the planning.
Maria Lopez
I'll text Isabella now to let her know to meet us at Hobbs Cafe.
Klaus Mueller
Let's inform Isabella about the time we'll meet at Hobbs Cafe, so she can plan accordingly.
Maria Lopez
I'll text Isabella now to let her know to meet us at Hobbs Cafe.
Klaus Mueller
Let's make sure we have all the necessary materials and information ready for the planning session with Isabella.
Maria Lopez
Let's make sure we also have a list of things we need from the store for the friends night out. I'll send you a quick message with the items before we head to Hobbs Cafe.
Klaus Mueller
Thank you for coordinating everything, Maria. Let's make sure we have everything we need for the planning session with Isabella.
